name: Roll In One (Tarek Creations)
description:
Roll in one is a 3d golf game where there are 6 holes numbered from 1 to 6...

Every time you start the game you roll a dice and you try to shoot the ball in the hole with the number on your dice.....

but every time you miss your shoot you have to roll the dice again... So the number of the hole you were shooting at could stay the same or CHANGE.

Controls

Drag with left mouse button and release to shoot the ball
